mapper.insert: insert into location_master(locationID, userID, createdDate ) values(#{locationID}, #{userID}, NOW() );
mapper.update: update location_master set deletedDate = NOW() where locationID = #{locationID};
mapper.insert: insert into location_detail(locationID, latitude, longitude , createdDate ) values(#{locationID}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, NOW() );
mapper.select: select lm.*, u.userName, u.profileImageURL , u.type from location_master lm left outer join user u on lm.userID=u.userID where lm.locationID=#{locationID} and lm.deletedDate is null;
select * from user_location where userID=#{userID} and locationName='현재위치'

select * from ( select l.toUserID, u.userName, u.profileImageURL, 'Y' as senderYN, l.status , l.autoResponseYN, l.autoExpiredDate, l.createdDate, l.updatedDate, l.deletedDate from location_history l left outer join user u on l.toUserID = u.userID and u.isDeleted is null where l.userID = #{value} union select l.userID, u.userName, u.profileImageURL, 'N' as senderYN, l.status , l.autoResponseYN, l.autoExpiredDate, l.createdDate, l.updatedDate, l.deletedDate from location_history l left outer join user u on l.userID = u.userID and u.isDeleted is null where l.toUserID = #{value} ) A where deletedDate is null order by updatedDate, createdDate
